Piers Morgan hits back at Baby Reindeer Netflix ‘stalker’ after confronting interview https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/piers-morgan-hits-back-at-baby-reindeer-netflix-stalker-after-confronting-interview/5WLJVUGS6JECDAHHTZ2H437U7M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/piers-morgan-hits-back-at-baby-reindeer-netflix-stalker-after-confronting-interview/5WLJVUGS6JECDAHHTZ2H437U7M/ She came forward claiming the show was about her. Now she's made a new claim. Wed, 15 May 2024 23:50:34 +0000 Piers Morgan has responded to claims from alleged Baby Reindeer stalker Fiona Harvey he only paid her £250 for an interview.
Hopper Developments plans 300-berth marina at Hobbs Bay, Gulf Harbour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/hopper-developments-plans-300-berth-marina-at-hobbs-bay-gulf-harbour/OCJTCTJBGRGN3EL4IISBSHGRGQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/hopper-developments-plans-300-berth-marina-at-hobbs-bay-gulf-harbour/OCJTCTJBGRGN3EL4IISBSHGRGQ/ Anne GibsonBerths are planned to be 14m to 25m with 10 superyacht berths at the new facility. Wed, 15 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The Hopper site at Hobbs Bay, opposite the Gulf Harbour Marina. The new marina would be built in this area.
Auckland security guard death: 82-year-old among four charged with obstructing police investigation into killing of Ramandeep Singh https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-security-guard-death-82-year-old-among-trio-charged-with-obstructing-investigation-into-killing-of-ramandeep-singh/ QZPGUUPZIVBSTIJWLL6XYX2WEM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-security-guard-death-82-year-old-among-trio-charged-with-obstructing-investigation-into-killing-of-ramandeep-singh/ QZPGUUPZIVBSTIJWLL6XYX2WEM/ George BlockThe Armourguard patrolman was found dead in a West Auckland reserve last year. Thu, 16 May 2024 00:33:13 +0000 Armourguard Security Mobile Patrol Officer, 25-year-old Ramandeep Singh, was killed by two people now charged with his murder in Massey's Royal Reserve carpark in Auckland on 18 December, 2023. Photo supplied by Armourguard Security

Concern Commerce Commission job cuts will impact services; changes revealed through leaked document https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/concern-commerce-commission-job-cuts-will-impact-services-changes-revealed-through-leaked-document/XV6KZSP7YVEQBDD4FOAQDGEW2E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/concern-commerce-commission-job-cuts-will-impact-services-changes-revealed-through-leaked-document/XV6KZSP7YVEQBDD4FOAQDGEW2E/ Azaria HowellThe Herald has seen an employees-only document from the commission, outlining the changes.
